effect.black_white: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.black_2_white_2: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

short_effect.black_white: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.

flavor_text.black_white: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
